hero.title: Great coffee made simple.
hero.text: Start your mornings with the world’s best coffees. Try our expertly curated artisan coffees from our best roasters delivered directly to your door, at your schedule.

collection.title: Gran Espresso
collection.text: Light and flavorful blend with cocoa and black pepper for an intense experience

collection.title: Planalto
collection.text: Brazilian dark roast with rich and velvety body, and hints of fruits and nuts

collection.title: Piccollo
collection.text: Mild and smooth blend featuring notes of toasted almond and dried cherry

collection.title: Danche
collection.text: Ethiopian hand-harvested blend densely packed with vibrant fruit notes

chooseUs.title: Why choose us?
chooseUs.text: A large part of our role is choosing which particular coffees will be featured in our range. This means working closely with the best coffee growers to give you a more impactful experience on every level.

cards.title: Best quality
cards.text: Discover an endless variety of the world’s best artisan coffee from each of our roasters.

cards.title: Exclusive benefits
cards.text: Special offers and swag when you subscribe, including 30% off your first shipment.

cards.title: Free shipping
cards.text: We cover the cost and coffee is delivered fast. Peak freshness: guaranteed.

cards.title: Pick your coffee
cards.text: Select from our evolving range of artisan coffees. Our beans are ethically sourced and we pay fair prices for them. There are new coffees in all profiles every month for you to try out.

cards.title: Choose the frequency
cards.text: Customize your order frequency, quantity, even your roast style and grind type. Pause, skip or cancel your subscription with no commitment through our online portal.

cards.title: Receive and enjoy!
cards.text: We ship your package within 48 hours, freshly roasted. Sit back and enjoy award-winning world-class coffees curated to provide a distinct tasting experience.

hero.title: About us
hero.text: Coffeeroasters began its journey of exotic discovery in 1999, highlighting stories of coffee from around the world. We have since been dedicated to bring the perfect cup - from bean to brew - in every shipment.

commitment.title: Our commitment
commitment.text: We’re built on a simple mission and a commitment to doing good along the way. We want to make it easy for you to discover and brew the world’s best coffee at home. It all starts at the source. To locate the specific lots we want to purchase, we travel nearly 60 days a year trying to understand the challenges and opportunities in each of these places. We collaborate with exceptional coffee growers and empower a global community of farmers through with well above fair-trade benchmarks. We also offer training, support farm community initiatives, and invest in coffee plant science. Curating only the finest blends, we roast each lot to highlight tasting profiles distinctive to their native growing region.

hero.title: Create a plan
hero.text: Build a subscription plan that best fits your needs. We offer an assortment of the best artisan coffees from around the globe delivered fresh to your door.

order.summary: How do you drink your coffee?

details.title: Capsule
details.text: Compatible with Nespresso systems and similar brewers

details.title: Filter
details.text: For pour over or drip methods like Aeropress, Chemex, and V60

details.title: Espresso
details.text: Dense and finely ground beans for an intense, flavorful experience

details.title: Single origin
details.text: Distinct, high quality coffee from a specific family-owned farm

details.title: Decaf
details.text: Just like regular coffee, except the caffeine has been removed

details.title: Blended
details.text: Combination of two or three dark roasted beans of organic coffees

details.title: 250g
details.text: Perfect for the solo drinker. Yields about 12 delicious cups.

details.title: 500g
details.text: Perfect option for a couple. Yields about 40 delectable cups.

details.title: 1000g
details.text: Perfect for offices and events. Yields about 90 delightful cups.

details.title: Wholebean
details.text: Best choice if you cherish the full sensory experience

details.title: Filter
details.text: For drip or pour-over coffee methods such as V60 or Aeropress

details.title: Cafetiére
details.text: Course ground beans specially suited for french press coffee

details.text: $14.00 per shipment. Includes free first-class shipping.

details.title: Every month
